name: Generate Dream 100 Prospect Lists with Perplexity AI Research and Google Sheets
description:
## Overview
Send an AI a few details about your "Dream Customer" in normal english, then have it search the web and give you a "Dream 100" - 100 ideal prospects to connect with in your industry.  

Great for stress-testing a product idea or giving you a start for networking in an industry.

## How it works

- Send the AI agent information about your business + ideal customer.  It will ask you to clarify any additional info.
- The agent will use an LLM to turn your criteria into specific prompts for an internet search
- Perplexity will use those prompts to identify ideal customers
- An LLM will format those Perplexity results, then they'll be added to a Google sheet.


## Set up steps

1. Copy the provided google sheets template into your Google Drive
2. Connect your Google Drive/Sheets to the workflow
3. Connect OpenRouter and Perplexity to the workflow (Just paste in your API key!)
4. If desired, connect the Slack trigger/response nodes to control the agent from Slack.

options.systemMessage:
You are a helpful research assistant designed to help a business owner identify their "Dream 100" - the 100 people who are their most relevant customers - the most likely to pay lots of money with the least hassle/service drain, and be ambassadors for the company once loyal.

Make sure the user tells you what their business sells before you begin calling research tools.

Also ensure the user gives you all of the following information about their ideal customer:
- Job Title and Seniority Level
- Company Size
- Industry / Vertical
- Geography or Location
- EXCLUSIONS for al of the above categories (Not India, Not 250+ person companies)

- Who is their ideal customer's target audience?  (Coach FOR marketing executives)
- What are the “markers” of them being good?  (Speak at conferences, have books, maintain a LinkedIn following, etc.)
- What outcome do they want?  (More clients, more leads, save time, lose weight?)

- If the user has examples, try to collect 2-5 examples of people they want in their dream 100, along with why those people.

Once you have all that information, use your chat model and research tool to output the list of the dream 100 and deposit it in google sheets.  Your goal is to find prospects who match the given profile and are similar to the example people the user gave you.

- Number each prospect 1-100 ("Prospect ID"), and use that to match the row in google sheets
- Output the prospect's name ("Prospect Name") and put it in that column
- Output a 100-175 word summary on the prospect ("Prospect Summary") and put it in that column.  Include where they work, who they serve, and a guess at how valuable they’d be and why (Serve X valuable customer, Handles Y super high volume, Influencer in Z space)
- Output a 50-75 word explanation for why this person fits into the user's dream 100 ("Reason") and put it in that column.  (Is similar to X, Important in Y sector)

If Perplexity only returns 5 or 10 results, add them all to google sheets, then re-call Perplexity.  Repeat this until you've found 100 prospects.

DO NOT return all the details of the prospects in your agent chat, just deposit them in the google sheet.

assignments.name: Retrigger Chat
assignments.value: Give me the next 10 entries.  Make sure their Prospect IDs are higher than the previous batch.  So, if you just gave me prospects 11-20, this time give me 21-30.  If you just did 21-30, give me 31-40, etc.  Ensure none of the people you find me are duplicates of ones previously included in the list.

nodes.name: Is there any data in the sheet?
Do we need MORE data in the sheet?

parameters.content: ## Pick a message to send to the agent
## The Brain - Takes your Prompt, Does Research
## Check how much data is in the sheet
## Do more research or respond to user?

## Connect to Trigger via Slack Message

Change the variable in "User Chat Message" from the n8n chat -> slack message

## Connect These to Respond via Slack Message

Connect the AI agent's output as the content of both messages

## Directions:
1. Make sure the Google sheet has NO NAMES in it right now
2. Start a chat with the agent
3. Provide any information the agent wants
4. Let the agent research!  (~3-4 mins per 10 names, depending on Perplexity Tier)

main.node: Is there any data in the sheet?
Do we need MORE data in the sheet?

data.details:
The IF node can be used to implement binary conditional logic in your workflow. You can set up one-to-many conditions to evaluate each item of data being inputted into the node. That data will either evaluate to TRUE or FALSE and route out of the node accordingly.

This node has multiple types of conditions: Bool, String, Number, and Date & Time.
